column2: ggplot(data = NULL, aes(x = x, y = y, shape = t, size = t, color = t ))+xlab("虚幻-现实")+ylab("理性-感性")+geom_point()+geom_abline(slope = 0, intercept = 0, color = "red", size = 2, linetype = "dashed")+geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "red", size = 2, linetype = "dashed") + guides(shape = FALSE, color = FALSE, size = FALSE)+geom_label_repel(aes(label = rownames(df),
`guides(<scale> = FALSE)` is deprecated. Please use `guides(<scale> = "none")` instead.
